703876f-a.title: Brooklyn: Crescent Street - Danford Avenue
703876f-a.text:
(1)
Crescent Street (elevator thereon), at the S.E. corner of Danford
Ave., showing Shaw's hotel in a set of two views. This hotel was
formerly on the S.E. Corner of Jamaica Ave. and Elderts Lane. In
1909 it was divided and moved to the sites seen in these views.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
The same, at the S.W. corner of Hemlock and Danford Ave.
June 1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
703876f-a.folder: Crescent Street & Danford Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
